DOC.brief_summary: This study include screen period , 6-month treatment period , 60-month , long-term extension period .
DOC.brief_title: Safety & Efficacy Study ALXN1101 Pediatric Patients With MoCD Type A Currently Treated With rcPMP
DOC.detailed_description: Patients receive daily IV infusion ALXN1101 start Day 1 . After prescribed period , dose increase monthly base define patient safety measure . After Month 6 , patient continue daily dose Month 66 last tolerate dose .
DOC.criteria: Male female patient genetically confirm diagnosis MoCD Type A ( MOCS1 mutation ) Currently treat rcPMP infusion Current plan treatment another investigational drug device , exception rcPMP treatment Day 1 .
